summary: Quietens the sounds for ragdoll and havok collisions.
descriptionHtml:
QUIET COLLISION SOUNDS



This mod quietens the sound effects of ragdoll and havok collisions. I made this mod because I found it immersion breaking when objects and lifeless bodies made such loud noises when colliding with things, even if they didn't have much velocity.Â 

This mod was meant to work alongside with Dead Body Collision Fix:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30947/]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30947/[/url]




To install, simply drop the Sounds folder into your Skyrim Data Folder, usually something along the lines of
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data
If prompted to merge folders or overwrite files, click Yes.



To uninstall, simply delete the associated sound files and folders.



Enjoy.
author: Billyro
